shortDescription: {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} is under attack --- invaders are here to take everything. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces are holding but starting to break. We need every able hand on the frontline now. Any help you can offer will mean the world to us. Warzones can be extremely long, come prepared for extended combat!
longDescription: Front lines, Commander --- and there's serious cash on the table for taking these guys down.  Just remember: don't get dead before you collect.

dialogueContent.words: Done and done, Commander.  Let's head on out.
Recon has spotted additional bogies coming your way.
Allies have communicated the rally point, they need you to be there to confirm extraction.
